items.content_html: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
items.title: VSG-EMEA/vsge-language-switcher: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. items.content_html: type-diff is a library to diff two strings, useful for showing for typing games (like monkeytype) or for showing differences between two strings. It is a simple library that is easy to use and has no dependencies. It is also very fast and lightweight.
